MyAppListener - Class in com.spotlight.track
MyAppListener monitors and registers application based events.
MyAppListener(LocalDataAccess, int) - Constructor for class com.spotlight.track.MyAppListener
The AppListener constructor initialise the action store location and the interval value.
MyCallListener - Class in com.spotlight.track
MyCallListener monitors and registers call based events.
MyCallListener(LocalDataAccess) - Constructor for class com.spotlight.track.MyCallListener
The constructor initialises the action store location and registers the callListener for the device.
MyGPSListener - Class in com.spotlight.track
MyGPSListener monitors and registers location based events.
MyGPSListener(LocalDataAccess, int) - Constructor for class com.spotlight.track.MyGPSListener
The GPSListener constructor initialise the action store location and the interval value.
MyMailListener - Class in com.spotlight.track
MyMailListener monitors and registers e-mail based events.
MyMailListener(LocalDataAccess) - Constructor for class com.spotlight.track.MyMailListener
The constructor initialises the action store location and registers a SendListener for the device.
MyServerUpload - Class in com.spotlight.track
MyServerUpload establishes the connection to the server and facilitates in the routine delivery of triggered event data to the server
MyServerUpload(LocalDataAccess, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.spotlight.track.MyServerUpload
Initialises the ServerUpload thread with the appropriate parameters.
MyTextListener - Class in com.spotlight.track
MyTextListener monitors and registers text message based events.
MyTextListener(LocalDataAccess) - Constructor for class com.spotlight.track.MyTextListener
The constructor initialises the action store location and registers a MessageListener for the device.
